info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 2:40AM MST until February 21 at 8:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 3 PM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to inches. * WHERE...Fergus County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 8 AM this morning to 3 PM MST Wednesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 8 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Severe to extreme conditions are expected for newborn livestock. Dangerous wind chills may cause frostbite in less than 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
